LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargePistol.label: charge pistol shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.label: charge pistol
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.description: A charged-shot pistol. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nThis three round burst pistol is a very effective sidearm deployed across all regiments of imperial commandos.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargePistol.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeShotgun.label: charge shotgun blast
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.label: charge shotgun
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.description: A charged-shot slug thrower. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nDeadly in close range, this shotgun has been banned by the imperial military for inflicting unmeasurable pain.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeShotgun.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeSMG.label: rapid charge shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.label: charge SMG
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.description: A charged-shot submachine gun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nFires rapidly but requires to close the distance between the target.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSMG.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeLMG.label: charge LMG shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeLMG.label: charge LMG
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeLMG.description: A charged-shot light machine gun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nCharge light machine gun fires a volley of projectiles at extreme speed which makes it ideal for area denial.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeLMG.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeSniperRifle.label: charge sniper shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.label: charge sniper rifle
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.description: A charged-shot triple barreled sniper rifle. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nDue to three separate barrels firing simultaneously, weapon power is reduced and rate of fire is decreased.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeSniperRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.VWE_Bullet_ChargeMinigun.label: charge minigun shot
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.label: charge minigun
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.description: A charged-shot minigun. Pulse-charge technology charges each shot with unstable energy as it leaves the barrel. Released on impact, the charged energy greatly increases the damage done.\n\nCapable of covering the entire area in volley of anti-armor rounds, this minigun is often used by glitterworld mercenaries during their infamous raids.
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.VWE_Gun_ChargeMinigun.tools.1.label: barrel
